Package in.co.rays.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ORSView  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseClt  
    ChangePasswordCtl
    Controller for handling change password functionality.
    CollegeCtl
    CollegeCtl is a Controller to handle College operations such as Add, Update, Reset and Cancel.
    CollegeListCtl
    CollegeListCtl is a Controller to handle list operations for College entities.
    CourseCtl
    CourseCtl Controller is used to handle Course operations such as Add, Update, Delete, and Search.
    CourseListCtl
    Course List Controller.
    ErrorCtl
    ErrorCtl is a controller to handle and forward the error requests to the predefined error view.
    FacultyCtl
    FacultyCtl Controller is responsible for handling all Faculty-related operations such as Add, Update, Reset, Cancel, and Preloading required data (College, Course, Subject).
    FacultyListCtl
    FacultyListCtl is a Controller that handles operations for displaying, searching, paginating, and deleting the list of Faculty records.
    ForgetPasswordCtl
    ForgetPasswordCtl handles the functionality for the "Forget Password" use case.
    FrontContoller
    FrontContoller is a servlet filter that acts as a Front Controller for all incoming requests to the application.
    GetMarksheetCtl
    GetMarksheetCtl is a Controller that is responsible for retrieving a Marksheet based on the Roll Number entered by the user.
    LoginCtl
    LoginCtl is a Controller class that handles Login, Logout, and SignUp operations.
    MarksheetCtl
    MarksheetCtl Controller is responsible for handling Marksheet related operations such as add, update, and validation of marksheet details.
    MarksheetListCtl
    Controller class to handle operations related to Marksheet List such as search, pagination, delete, navigation, and displaying the list of marksheets.
    MarksheetMeritListCtl
    Controller to handle requests for displaying the Marksheet Merit List.
    MyProfileCtl
    MyProfileCtl Controller handles user profile management such as viewing and updating personal details and redirecting to change password.
    RoleCtl
    RoleCtl Servlet acts as Controller for Role functionality.
    RoleListCtl
    RoleListCtl Servlet handles the Role list operations such as searching, displaying, pagination, and deleting role records.
    StudentCtl
    StudentCtl Controller is responsible for handling requests related to Student operations such as add, update, and validation.
    StudentListCtl
    StudentListCtl Servlet Controller is responsible for controlling the list of Student records.
    SubjectCtl
    Controller class for handling Subject operations such as add, update, delete, and view.
    SubjectListCtl
    SubjectListCtl Controller is used to perform operations related to listing, searching, and deleting Subject entities.
    TimeTableCtl
    TimeTableCtl Servlet acts as a Controller to handle Timetable operations such as add, update, preload, and validation.
    TimeTableListCtl
    TimeTableListCtl Servlet acts as a Controller to handle operations for displaying, searching, deleting, and navigating Timetable records.
    UserCtl
    UserCtl Controller is responsible for handling user-related requests.
    UserListCtl
    UserListCtl Servlet Controller.
    UserRegistrationCtl
    UserRegistrationCtl Servlet handles user registration process.
    WelcomeCtl
    WelcomeCtl Servlet handles requests for the Welcome page of the application.
